name: Anthill (itch) (LoLQa)
description:
Anthill is a game about you having an ant colony and making them survive trough attacks and hunger.You can craft hats for ants, farm, collect food and relax...(sometimes).

The controls are simple:

Left click to destroy blocks

Right click to place blocks/leafs/seeds/farming

shift + left click to command some ants

G to save

Some helpful tips:

You need to EAT to gain stamina

Don't let the food counter go below the ants counter

If the queen dies you lose 

you can click enemies to kill them but it cost stamina

Team members:

Stuartxyz/LoLQa (Me!) : programming and game design and sounds

Lexany14: sprites and art

Chin: Music

(we are only 16 year olds)
